goal.en: “1.Students will develop online rhetorical styles through voice and written conversations. 2.Students will explore online identities through the discursive complexity and creativity of interaction in multiuser virtual environments. 3.Students will produce multimedia and narrative content for diverse audiences.“
goal.ch: “1.Students will develop online rhetorical styles through voice and written conversations. 2.Students will explore online identities through the discursive complexity and creativity of interaction in multiuser virtual environments. 3.Students will produce multimedia and narrative content for diverse audiences.“

content.en: “This course introduces current approaches to online language learning and communication. The topics include English and globalization, social media and identity, creative writing and multimodal narrative, and interaction through virtual reality. We will explore emerging language learning environments and play-world cultures of virtual communities. Students will complete online tasks and projects by collaborating with peers and using networked technologies. The goal is to develop critical thinking and rhetorical strategies through multiple resources and media discourses.“
